column5: Come stay in one of South Padre Island's most beautiful beachfront penthouse condominiums. Located at Saida Royale Beach and Tennis Club, this gated community is the premier destination for SPI vactationers. The remodeled 15th floor unit has decorator quality furnishings and million dollar views of the gulf, bay, and downtown SPI.  Among the many amenities offered are:   3 swimming pools and two hot tubs seasonal pool bar and sandwich shop short walk to many restaurants 24 hour Security
column8: Beachfront Penthouse with private rooftop balcony
